item.title: Sterling Rises After U.K. PMI Data
item.description: Sterling rose after the U.K. PMI survey showed continued expansion in private sector output and an acceleration in input price inflation, and S&P said...

item.title: European Credit Investors Prefer Euro Credit to Dollar Credit
item.description: European credit investors prefer euro-denominated credit to dollar-denominated credit due to growing expectations for more interest-rate cuts in the e...

item.title: Nasdaq Futures Rise and Bitcoin Rallies
item.description: Dow industrials and S&P 500 futures edged up, while the Nasdaq-100 saw slightly bigger gains. Global markets were broadly lower.

item.title: Cruise Lines Are Basking in Holiday Cheer
item.description: This “wave season” is shaping up to be not only the strongest since the pandemic but also the best ever.

item.title: Apollo CEO's Flirtation With Politics Brings New Urgency to Succession Planning
item.description: Marc Rowan is one of the few private-equity chiefs who hasn’t clearly designated an heir apparent.
